questions.question: Playing with knives is the best thing ever, I should do it

choices.answer: True
False
Dull blades are harder to work with & require more pressure
They are easier to clean
A sharp knive will make me look cool
They don't rust as easily

questions.question: You should______________________ what you are doing when using a knife

choices.answer: Ignore
Forget
Concentrate on
Remember

questions.question: You should always use a cutting board when you are using a knife because they

choices.answer: prevent food from spilling on the floor
Make it easier to divide ingredients
Keep your knife sharp
Protect surfaces you cut on from being damaged

questions.question: Knives should be kept away from edges of counters, tables and other surfaces to

choices.answer: Lessen the chances that you might lose them
Help remind you where they should be stored
Keep them from being knocked on the floor or someones foot
Make the kitchen areas easier to clean

questions.question: You should step out of the way if a knife is dropped. Don't try to catch it

choices.answer: True
False

questions.question: A knife is a great multi-purpose tool, I could use it for all kinds of things like

choices.answer: opening a can
A knife should only be used for its intended purpose
Removing a staple
Opening a box

questions.question: If you have strawberries to core and slice, would using a huge cleaver knife be a good idea?

choices.answer: You betcha, the bigger the better!
No, use a saw instead
Go big or go home!
No, use a small knife for cutting up small berries

questions.question: If you are carrying a knife from your work area to another part of the kitchen, carry the knife

choices.answer: By the handle with the tip down and blade away from the body
With the blade pointing out--en garde!
I don't carry knives, I throw them
Lying flat, across your palms, blade side out

questions.question: It's a good idea to keep knife handles free of grease or other slippery substances

choices.answer: True
False

questions.question: Should you use a knife with a loose and wobbly handle?

choices.answer: Yes, it isn't broken yet--waste not want not!
No, throw it away, it might break while you are using it
